name: SCNMaterialProperty
desc: A container for the color or texture of one of a material’s visual properties.

items.name: init(contents: Any)
items.desc: Creates a new material property object with the specified contents.

items.name: var contents: Any?
items.desc: The visual contents of the material property—a color, image, or source of animated content. Animatable.

items.name: var intensity: CGFloat
items.desc: A number between 0.0 and 1.0 that modulates the effect of the material property. Animatable.

items.name: var contentsTransform: SCNMatrix4
items.desc: The transformation applied to the material property’s visual contents. Animatable.

items.name: var wrapS: SCNWrapMode
items.desc: The wrapping behavior for the S texture coordinate.

items.name: var wrapT: SCNWrapMode
items.desc: The wrapping behavior for the T texture coordinate.

items.name: enum SCNWrapMode
items.desc: Modes to apply to texture wrapping, used by the wrapT and wrapS properties.

items.name: var minificationFilter: SCNFilterMode
items.desc: Texture filtering for rendering the material property’s image contents at a size smaller than that of the original image.

items.name: var magnificationFilter: SCNFilterMode
items.desc: Texture filtering for rendering the material property’s image contents at a size larger than that of the original image.

items.name: var mipFilter: SCNFilterMode
items.desc: Texture filtering for using mipmaps to render the material property’s image contents at a size smaller than that of the original image.

items.name: enum SCNFilterMode
items.desc: Texture filtering modes, used by the minificationFilter, magnificationFilter, and mipFilter properties.

items.name: var maxAnisotropy: CGFloat
items.desc: The amount of anisotropic texture filtering to be used when rendering the material property’s image contents.

items.name: var mappingChannel: Int
items.desc: The source of texture coordinates for mapping the material property’s image contents.
